member.name: IMFPresentationDescriptor.Clone
member.summary: Creates a copy of this presentation descriptor.
member.param: Receives a pointer to the interface of the new presentation descriptor. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFPresentationDescriptor.DeselectStream
member.summary: Deselects a stream in the presentation.
member.param: The stream number to deselect, indexed from zero. To find the number of streams in the presentation, call the method.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFPresentationDescriptor.GetStreamDescriptorByIndex
member.summary: Retrieves a stream descriptor for a stream in the presentation. The stream descriptor contains information about the stream.
member.param: Zero-based index of the stream. To find the number of streams in the presentation, call the method.

Receives a Boolean value. The value is TRUE if the stream is currently selected, or FALSE if the stream is currently deselected. If a stream is selected, the media source generates data for that stream when is called. The media source will not generated data for deselected streams. To select a stream, call .To deselect a stream, call .
Receives a pointer to the stream descriptor's interface. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFPresentationDescriptor.GetStreamDescriptorCount
member.summary: Retrieves the number of stream descriptors in the presentation. Each stream descriptor contains information about one stream in the media source. To retrieve a stream descriptor, call the method.
member.param: Receives the number of stream descriptors.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFPresentationDescriptor.SelectStream
member.summary: Selects a stream in the presentation.
member.param: The stream number to select, indexed from zero. To find the number of streams in the presentation, call .

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFPresentationDescriptor
member.summary: Describes the details of a presentation. A presentation is a set of related media streams that share a common presentation time.
